indicator_name: (a) 인구다양성, (b) 토지균형개발, (c) 지방재정강화를 고려한 국가 도시정책 혹은 지역개발계획을 갖춘 국가의 수
target_name: 국가 및 지역개발계획을 강화하여 도시, 근교도시 그리고 농촌간의 긍정적인 경제, 사회 및 환경적 연결고리를 지원

en.title: Proportion of population living in cities that implement urban and regional development plans integrating population projections and resource needs, by size of city
en.indicator_name: Number of countries that have national urban policies or regional development plans that (a) respond to population dynamics, (b) ensure balanced territorial development, (c)  increase local fiscal space
en.target: Support positive economic, social and environmental links between urban, peri-urban and rural areas by strengthening national and regional development planning
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 2066kB)
en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
